levelName: 英文單字認讀基礎級(二)

examples.english: I have four red apples in my bag today.
examples.chinese: 我今天書包裡有四顆紅蘋果。

examples.english: We go home from school at four o'clock in the afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我們下午四點鐘從學校回家。

examples.english: There are four children playing together in the park.
examples.chinese: 有四個小朋友在公園裡一起玩耍。

examples.english: I have five red pencils for drawing.
examples.chinese: 我有五枝紅色鉛筆可以畫畫。

examples.english: It is five o'clock now, time to eat.
examples.chinese: 現在是五點了，該吃飯了。

examples.english: There are five people in my happy family.
examples.chinese: 我的幸福家庭裡有五個人。

examples.english: I have six colorful pencils in my box.
examples.chinese: 我有六枝彩色鉛筆在我的盒子裡。

examples.english: We eat dinner at six o'clock every night.
examples.chinese: 我們每天晚上六點吃晚餐。

examples.english: My little brother is six years old this year.
examples.chinese: 我弟弟今年六歲。

examples.english: There are seven colorful balloons floating high.
examples.chinese: 有七顆彩色氣球高高地飄著。

examples.english: My little brother is seven years old today.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟今天七歲了。

examples.english: School starts at seven in the morning.
examples.chinese: 學校早上七點開始上課。

examples.english: There are eight apples on the table.
examples.chinese: 桌子上有八顆蘋果。

examples.english: I go to school at eight o'clock every day.
examples.chinese: 我每天八點去學校。

examples.english: My friend is eight years old today.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友今天八歲了。

examples.english: There are nine red apples in the basket.
examples.chinese: 籃子裡有九顆紅蘋果。

examples.english: School starts at nine o'clock every morning.
examples.chinese: 學校每天早上九點開始上課。

examples.english: My little brother is nine years old this year.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟今年九歲。

examples.english: I have ten red apples in my lunch box today.
examples.chinese: 我今天午餐盒裡有十顆紅蘋果。

examples.english: My sister is ten years old this year, and she is very tall.
examples.chinese: 我妹妹今年十歲了，她很高。

examples.english: We meet at ten o'clock this morning for fun playtime.
examples.chinese: 我們今天早上十點見面，一起開心玩。

examples.english: I have eleven red apples in my basket.
examples.chinese: 我籃子裡有十一顆紅蘋果。

examples.english: Our math class starts at eleven o'clock.
examples.chinese: 我們的數學課十一點開始。

examples.english: My good friend is eleven years old now.
examples.chinese: 我的好朋友現在十一歲了。

examples.english: There are twelve students in my class.
examples.chinese: 我們班有十二個學生。

examples.english: We eat lunch at twelve every day.
examples.chinese: 我們每天十二點吃午餐。

examples.english: My sister is twelve years old today.
examples.chinese: 我的妹妹今天十二歲了。

examples.english: We learn many new things at school every day.
examples.chinese: 我們每天在學校學到許多新東西。

examples.english: School starts at eight o'clock and ends in the afternoon.
examples.chinese: 學校八點開始上課，下午結束。

examples.english: My school has a big library with many interesting books.
examples.chinese: 我的學校有一個大圖書館，裡面有許多有趣的書。

examples.english: I like my class and my teacher.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡我的班級和我的老師。

examples.english: Today we have English class with Miss Lin.
examples.chinese: 今天我們和林老師有英文課。

examples.english: The bell rings, so it is time for class.
examples.chinese: 鐘聲響了，所以現在是上課時間。

examples.english: She is a good student and always studies hard.
examples.chinese: 她是個好學生，而且總是努力學習。

examples.english: Many students like to play outside during break time.
examples.chinese: 許多學生都喜歡在下課時間到外面玩。

examples.english: Every student in our class has a red backpack.
examples.chinese: 我們班上每個學生都有一個紅色的背包。

examples.english: She is my kind English teacher.
examples.chinese: 她是我的英文老師，她人很好。

examples.english: Our teacher teaches us many interesting stories.
examples.chinese: 我們的老師教我們許多有趣的故事。

examples.english: A good teacher helps all students learn happily.
examples.chinese: 一位好老師幫助所有學生快樂學習。

examples.english: This is my friend, Lily. She likes to read books.
examples.chinese: 這是我的朋友莉莉。她喜歡讀書。

examples.english: My friend and I like to share our toys.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友和我喜歡分享我們的玩具。

examples.english: Good friends always help each other learn and play.
examples.chinese: 好朋友總是互相幫助學習和玩耍。

examples.english: I like to read a story book with pictures.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡讀有圖片的故事書。

examples.english: My mom wants to book a table at the restaurant.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽想在餐廳預訂一個位子。

examples.english: Please write your name in your new notebook.
examples.chinese: 請把你的名字寫在你的新本子上。

examples.english: I have a yellow chair at my desk.
examples.chinese: 我書桌旁有一張黃色椅子。

examples.english: Please sit on the chair to eat dinner.
examples.chinese: 請坐在椅子上吃晚餐。

examples.english: The living room has many comfortable chairs.
examples.chinese: 客廳裡有許多舒服的椅子。

examples.english: I sit at my desk and read a book.
examples.chinese: 我坐在書桌前看書。

examples.english: My desk has a pen and a book.
examples.chinese: 我的書桌上有一枝筆和一本書。

examples.english: This is a big desk in my classroom.
examples.chinese: 這是我們教室裡的一張大書桌。

examples.english: We eat our breakfast at the kitchen table every morning.
examples.chinese: 我們每天早上在餐桌吃早餐。

examples.english: Please put your book on the table after you read it.
examples.chinese: 請把你的書放在桌上，等你讀完之後。

examples.english: My sister draws pictures on the big table in her room.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐在她房間的大桌子上畫畫。

examples.english: I have a new blue pen in my pencil box.
examples.chinese: 我有一個新的藍色筆在我的鉛筆盒裡。

examples.english: My teacher uses a red pen to mark our homework.
examples.chinese: 我的老師用一支紅色的筆來批改我們的功課。

examples.english: Where is my pen? I need to write a letter.
examples.chinese: 我的筆在哪裡？我需要寫一封信。

examples.english: I have a yellow pencil for drawing pictures.
examples.chinese: 我有一枝黃色鉛筆用來畫圖。

examples.english: Please use your pencil to write your name here.
examples.chinese: 請用你的鉛筆在這裡寫下你的名字。

examples.english: There are three pencils in my pencil case.
examples.chinese: 我的鉛筆盒裡有三枝鉛筆。

examples.english: I use a ruler to measure the paper.
examples.chinese: 我用尺量紙張。

examples.english: I use my ruler to draw a straight line.
examples.chinese: 我用我的尺畫直線。

examples.english: This ruler is made of plastic and is blue.
examples.chinese: 這把尺是塑膠的，藍色的。

examples.english: I have a small eraser in my pencil box.
examples.chinese: 我在我的鉛筆盒裡有一個小的橡皮擦。

examples.english: I use an eraser to clean my pencil mistakes.
examples.chinese: 我用橡皮擦擦掉我的鉛筆錯誤。

examples.english: Look! My eraser can erase all the pencil lines.
examples.chinese: 看！我的橡皮擦可以擦掉所有的鉛筆線。

examples.english: Please use a red marker to draw a big apple.
examples.chinese: 請用紅色麥克筆畫一個大蘋果。

examples.english: The big rock is a marker for our secret base.
examples.chinese: 這塊大石頭是我們秘密基地的標記。

examples.english: This cute ribbon is a marker for my book.
examples.chinese: 這條可愛的緞帶是我的書籤。

examples.english: She puts her toys in a small box.
examples.chinese: 她把玩具放在一個小盒子裡。

examples.english: He opens a big box to get a book.
examples.chinese: 他打開一個大箱子拿一本書。

examples.english: My birthday gift is inside a colorful box.
examples.chinese: 我的生日禮物在一個彩色的盒子裡。

examples.english: My pencil box is blue and has a cute cat.
examples.chinese: 我的鉛筆盒是藍色的，上面有一隻可愛的貓。

examples.english: I put my pencils and eraser in the pencil box.
examples.chinese: 我把我的鉛筆和橡皮擦放進鉛筆盒裡。

examples.english: He opens his pencil box to take out a ruler.
examples.chinese: 他打開鉛筆盒，拿出一把尺。

examples.english: I use a map to find the library.
examples.chinese: 我用一張地圖來找圖書館。

examples.english: Let's draw a map of our school playground.
examples.chinese: 我們來畫一張學校操場的地圖。

examples.english: The world map shows many different countries.
examples.chinese: 世界地圖顯示很多不同的國家。

examples.english: My favorite color is blue.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的顏色是藍色。

examples.english: The rainbow has many beautiful colors.
examples.chinese: 彩虹有許多美麗的顏色。

examples.english: I like to color a picture with crayons.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡用蠟筆畫圖上色。

examples.english: Look! This big apple is red and sweet.
examples.chinese: 看！這個大蘋果是紅色又甜的。

examples.english: When the traffic light is red, you must stop.
examples.chinese: 當交通燈是紅色時，你必須停下來。

examples.english: My mom wears a beautiful red dress today.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽今天穿了一件漂亮的紅色洋裝。

examples.english: The grass in the park is very green now.
examples.chinese: 公園裡的草現在很綠。

examples.english: Look, the little frog is green and jumps.
examples.chinese: 看，這隻小青蛙是綠色的，而且會跳。

examples.english: Don't eat that banana, it is still very green.
examples.chinese: 不要吃那根香蕉，它還很綠。

examples.english: I have a blue pen in my school bag.
examples.chinese: 我有一個藍色的筆在我的書包裡。

examples.english: The sky is blue on a sunny day.
examples.chinese: 晴天的時候天空是藍色的。

examples.english: My friend likes to draw with a blue crayon.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友喜歡用藍色的蠟筆畫畫。

examples.english: The bright sun is yellow in the sky.
examples.chinese: 亮亮的太陽在天空中是黃色的。

examples.english: Look at the yellow flower in the garden.
examples.chinese: 看那花園裡的黃色花朵。

examples.english: My brother plays with his new yellow ball.
examples.chinese: 我的弟弟玩著他那顆新的黃色球。

examples.english: I have a soft pink blanket on my bed.
examples.chinese: 我床上有一條軟軟的粉紅色毯子。

examples.english: My younger sister always chooses pink for her drawings.
examples.chinese: 我的妹妹畫畫時總是選粉紅色。

examples.english: Look at that cute pig; it is all pink!
examples.chinese: 看那隻可愛的豬；牠全身都是粉紅色的！

examples.english: My friend has a cute black cat at home.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友家裡有一隻可愛的黑貓。

examples.english: I use a black pen to draw a picture.
examples.chinese: 我用一支黑色的筆畫圖。

examples.english: When night comes, the sky becomes very black.
examples.chinese: 當夜晚來臨時，天空變得非常黑。

examples.english: I see a big white cloud in the sky.
examples.chinese: 我在天空中看到一朵大白雲。

examples.english: We often eat white rice for dinner.
examples.chinese: 我們晚餐經常吃白飯。

examples.english: My mom likes her new white shoes.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽喜歡她的新白鞋子。

examples.english: My little sister has a cute round face.
examples.chinese: 我的小妹妹有一張可愛的圓臉。

examples.english: Please face the front when the teacher is talking.
examples.chinese: 老師說話的時候，請面向前方。

examples.english: The clock's face shows the time with big numbers.
examples.chinese: 時鐘的鐘面用大數字顯示時間。

examples.english: I use my eyes to see the beautiful flowers in the garden.
examples.chinese: 我用我的眼睛看花園裡美麗的花。

examples.english: The little cat eyed the toy mouse on the floor carefully.
examples.chinese: 小貓咪仔細地盯著地板上的玩具老鼠看。

examples.english: Mom told me to keep an eye on my little brother at the park.
examples.chinese: 媽媽叫我在公園裡看好我的弟弟。

examples.english: I use my nose to smell tasty food.
examples.chinese: 我用我的鼻子聞好吃的食物。

examples.english: She has a cute nose on her face.
examples.chinese: 她的臉上有一隻可愛的鼻子。

examples.english: When I have a cold, I blow my nose.
examples.chinese: 當我感冒時，我會擤我的鼻子。

examples.english: I use my ears to hear my teacher speak.
examples.chinese: 我用耳朵聽老師說話。

examples.english: A rabbit has two long ears on its head.
examples.chinese: 兔子頭上有兩隻長長的耳朵。

examples.english: We eat a sweet ear of corn for dinner.
examples.chinese: 我們晚餐吃一根甜甜的玉米。

examples.english: I use my mouth to eat yummy food.
examples.chinese: 我用我的嘴巴吃好吃的食物。

examples.english: My mouth opens when I sing a song.
examples.chinese: 我唱歌的時候，我的嘴巴會張開。

examples.english: A frog has a big mouth to catch flies.
examples.chinese: 青蛙有一個大嘴巴來抓蒼蠅。

examples.english: I use my head to think about many things.
examples.chinese: 我用我的頭想很多事情。

examples.english: We head to the park to play after school.
examples.chinese: 我們放學後會前往公園玩。

examples.english: Please stand at the head of the line.
examples.chinese: 請排在隊伍的最前面。
